src/main/pdf/Document.tsx.description: Emoji source already registered via Font.registerEmojiSource() using Apple emoji CDN at cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/emoji-datasource-apple@15.1.2/img/apple/64/ with PNG format

src/main/pdf/components/InlineText.tsx.description: Contains disabled emoji handling code (isEmoji, splitTextWithEmoji, renderTextWithEmoji) marked with @ts-expect-error. TODO comment says 'React-PDF doesn't handle mixed fonts well' - this is where the fix needs to happen
